channel.title: The Last of Us on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The Last of Us on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘The Last of Us’ Season 2 Just Scored a Bunch of Emmy Nominations
item.description: The second season of HBO’s genre hit racked up a lot of noms, including best lead acting nods for Bella Ramsey and Pedro Pascal (despite his rather limited screen time).
